Contributor: Great Britain. Parliamentary and joint Labour Recruiting Committee, publisher.;
Note: Date based on dates of 1st World War. "Poster No. 162." "Wt. W. 17193/786." appears on the bottom right of the poster. Orientation: Vertical.
Description: Text says to starred or badged single men and single men in reserve occupations, that they should attest now and inform the recruiting officer of their special position. No pictorial content.
Digital Collection: Allied Posters of World War I
Publisher: London : Parliamentary and Joint Labour Recruiting Committee,
Series: Poster (Great Britain. Parliamentary Recruiting Committee) ; no. 162.
Local Rights Statement: This material is made available for private study, scholarship, and research use. For access to the original or a high resolution reproduction, contact: Temple University Libraries, Special Collections Research Center, scrc@temple.edu, 215-204-8257.
Physical Description: 1 poster : blue and tan ; 77 x 51 cm.

Title: To starred or badged single men
